title: Alice Springs: red heart blue centre
creator_credit: James Coffey, Frank Bagnall, Department of the Northern Territory and Film Australia
brief_description: Alice Springs is viewed here in its natural environment of desert landscape, ringed by distant ranges and Ayers Rock and as a busy township with its regular services, activities and recreations. From varied shots of its people and activities the camera frequently returns to the countryside around and shows close-up shots of its plant life. No spoken commentary.
creator_credit_for_label: James Coffey, Frank Bagnall, Department of the Northern Territory and Film Australia
